message: A fair split, considering potential inflation for you, Bob.
My offer is a fair 50/50 split. Inflation has already devalued your initial offer by 10%, so this is the most equitable path forward. Take it or leave it.
Bob, inflation is hitting you harder. I'm still offering a generous amount to you considering the decreased value for you.
This is my final offer. Inflation has significantly eroded the value of the money for me. Take this, or you'll get even less next round. I'm being generous.
